conference: IEEE Transactions on Circuits and Systems for Video Technology
title: Local Large-Margin Multi-Metric Learning for Face and Kinship Verification
summary: This paper introduces a large-margin multi-metric learning (LM³L) method for face and kinship verification.  Unlike single-metric methods, LM³L jointly learns multiple distance metrics from multiple feature representations, maximizing correlations and enforcing large margins between positive and negative pairs.  Local metric learning (LML) and local LM³L variants are also proposed to exploit local manifold structures. Experiments on three face datasets demonstrate competitive results compared to state-of-the-art methods.
